short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Firestore view in firebase console is limited to ~1250px, which is restrictive for larger screens. This extension sets it to 100%.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives developers better use of their screen real estate when using Firestore data viewer in the Firebase console. The data seems to be unnecessarily restricted to <1300px. You can use 100% of the available view now with this extension.

v0.0.1 2023/Oct/17 Initial Version
v0.0.2 2023/Oct/18 Xpath bug fix. Checks a few times for correct element instead of once at a fixed time.
v0.0.3 2024/04/25 Changed match url to have /database/* since firestore changed its url
